The phonon symmetry in these crystals has been studied by Molina-Sánchez & Wirtz (2011 ▸), Ribeiro-Soares et al. (2014 ▸) and Saito et al. (2016 ▸). However, diperiodic groups were introduced explicitly only by Evarestov (2015 ▸), Evarestov et al. (2017 ▸) and Bocharov et al. (2019 ▸). In the work of Ribeiro-Soares et al. (2014 ▸), the symmetry of single layers was described in terms of the related space group
(No. 187) and, in addition, the authors applied a non-standard irrep notation, which hinders the use and comparison of their results.
